name: Sports For Fun Online Quiz | USA | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the only NBA basketball player to score 100 points in a single game in the twentieth century?
questions.explanation:
Wilt Chamberlain.

	Michael Jordan only scored 63 points in a game.
